<a name="CORSConfig"></a>
## type [CORSConfig](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/platform/httpserver/config.go#L22-L27>)

CORSConfig configures Cross\-Origin Resource Sharing behaviour

```go
type CORSConfig struct {
    AllowedOrigins   []string
    AllowedMethods   []string
    AllowedHeaders   []string
    AllowCredentials bool
}
```

<a name="Config"></a>
## type [Config](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/platform/httpserver/config.go#L10-L19>)

Config captures the runtime configuration of the HTTP server

```go
type Config struct {
    Host            string
    Port            int
    ReadTimeout     time.Duration
    WriteTimeout    time.Duration
    IdleTimeout     time.Duration
    ShutdownTimeout time.Duration
    Mode            Mode
    CORS            CORSConfig
}
```

```go
func (c Config) Address() string
```

Address renders the host and port into a listen address understood by net/http

func (c *Config) Normalize()

<a name="Mode"></a>
## type [Mode](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/platform/httpserver/config.go#L30>)

Mode describes the runtime mode of the Gin engine

```go
type Mode string
```

<a name="ModeDebug"></a>

```go
const (
    ModeDebug   Mode = "debug"
    ModeRelease Mode = "release"
    ModeTest    Mode = "test"
)
```
